constituent: lid, flowers, gone, soil, dirt, ground, elbow, dish
koohiiStory1: The lid of this dish is gone! Now the whole room smells of the flowers that were used in the cooking.
koohiiStory2: When the magician lifted the LID, the flowers were gone from the dish.
kunYomi: ふた、けだ.し、おお.う、かさ、かこう
words:
蓋(がい): cover, lid, cap
目蓋(まぶた): eyelid
蓋(ふた): cover, lid, cap
